description:
11.61 dedot
Reduce cross-luminance (dot-crawl) and cross-color (rainbows) from video.

It accepts the following options:
name: dedot

options.description: Set mode of operation. Can be combination of dotcrawl for cross-luminance reduction and/or rainbows for cross-color reduction.
options.name: m

options.description: Set spatial luma threshold. Lower values increases reduction of cross-luminance.
options.name: lt

options.description: Set tolerance for temporal luma. Higher values increases reduction of cross-luminance.
options.name: tl

options.description: Set tolerance for chroma temporal variation. Higher values increases reduction of cross-color.
options.name: tc

options.description: Set temporal chroma threshold. Lower values increases reduction of cross-color.
options.name: ct
